title: Weird dream...
text:
A few days ago, I had a dream that I became a super saiyan. I rode through my workplace on a golden dragon, but then Vegeta came in, ate my hair, and stole my super saiyan power. Then I just went back to my day job...

(via reddit)

title: a haiku for heroku
text:
heroku create
git push heroku HEAD:main
use master instead
